properties.name: AuthScheme
properties.description: The type of authentication that the proxy uses for connections from the proxy to the underlying database.

type.description: The type of authentication that the proxy uses for connections from the proxy to the underlying database.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A user-specified description about the authentication used by a proxy to log in as a specific database user.

type.description: A user-specified description about the authentication used by a proxy to log in as a specific database user.

properties.name: IAMAuth
properties.description: Whether to require or disallow Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication for connections to the proxy. The ENABLED value is valid only for proxies with RDS for Microsoft SQL Server.

type.description: Whether to require or disallow Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) authentication for connections to the proxy. The ENABLED value is valid only for proxies with RDS for Microsoft SQL Server.

properties.name: SecretArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) representing the secret that the proxy uses to authenticate to the RDS DB instance or Aurora DB cluster. These secrets are stored within Amazon Secrets Manager.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) representing the secret that the proxy uses to authenticate to the RDS DB instance or Aurora DB cluster. These secrets are stored within Amazon Secrets Manager.

properties.name: ClientPasswordAuthType
properties.description: The type of authentication the proxy uses for connections from clients.

type.description: The type of authentication the proxy uses for connections from clients.

properties.name: Auth
properties.description: The authorization mechanism that the proxy uses.

type.description: The authorization mechanism that the proxy uses.

properties.name: DBProxyName
properties.description: The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

type.description: The identifier for the proxy. This name must be unique for all proxies owned by your AWS account in the specified AWS Region.

properties.name: DebugLogging
properties.description: Whether the proxy includes detailed information about SQL statements in its logs.

type.description: Whether the proxy includes detailed information about SQL statements in its logs.

properties.name: EngineFamily
properties.description: The kinds of databases that the proxy can connect to.

type.description: The kinds of databases that the proxy can connect to.

properties.name: IdleClientTimeout
properties.description: The number of seconds that a connection to the proxy can be inactive before the proxy disconnects it.

type.description: The number of seconds that a connection to the proxy can be inactive before the proxy disconnects it.

properties.name: RequireTLS
properties.description: A Boolean parameter that specifies whether Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption is required for connections to the proxy.

type.description: A Boolean parameter that specifies whether Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption is required for connections to the proxy.

properties.name: RoleArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that the proxy uses to access secrets in AWS Secrets Manager.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that the proxy uses to access secrets in AWS Secrets Manager.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An optional set of key-value pairs to associate arbitrary data of your choosing with the proxy.

type.description: An optional set of key-value pairs to associate arbitrary data of your choosing with the proxy.

properties.name: VpcSecurityGroupIds
properties.description: VPC security group IDs to associate with the new proxy.

type.description: VPC security group IDs to associate with the new proxy.

properties.name: VpcSubnetIds
properties.description: VPC subnet IDs to associate with the new proxy.

type.description: VPC subnet IDs to associate with the new proxy.

properties.name: DBProxyArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the proxy.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the proxy.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint that you can use to connect to the proxy. You include the endpoint value in the connection string for a database client application.

type.description: The endpoint that you can use to connect to the proxy. You include the endpoint value in the connection string for a database client application.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: VPC ID to associate with the new DB proxy.

type.description: VPC ID to associate with the new DB proxy.
